description: A React functional component named ReceiptModal for uploading receipts, handling file input, upload process, and displaying uploaded receipt link or errors.

methods.name: ReceiptModal({ onClose, onUpload, loading })
methods.description: React component rendering a modal dialog for uploading receipt files, managing upload state, error handling, and displaying upload status.

methods.name: handleUpload()
methods.description: Asynchronous function to invoke the onUpload callback with the selected file, updating URL state or setting error messages.
